avalancheActivity.highlights: Rather little snow remains in the mountains, and it has melted and settled due to the recent warm weather and rain. Most of the snow that fell last week is now located in gullies.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Rather little snow remains in the mountains, and it has melted and settled due to the recent warm weather and rain. Most of the snow that fell last week is now located in gullies. Naturally released avalanches are not expected, but people could trigger small sluffs in steep terrain

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in northern Westfjords in the last three days but sleet/rain in the lowlands. In the rest of the country, the new snow from last week has mostly melted in rain over the weekend. Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæglætis veður, NA-átt bjart og úrkomulítið.

avalancheActivity.comment: A small avalanche fell above Flateyri, detected by an avalancheradar, on 31 October.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow cover is different between fjords. Snow has accumulated in gullies and there are possible windslabs in southerly aspects.  The snow is expected to melt and subside in warmer weather on Tuesday and become more stable as it cools again on Wednesday and Thursday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow cover is different between fjords, with more snow in the NV-part. Snow has accumulated in gullies and there are possible windslabs in southerly aspects. A small avalanche fell by Flateyri on October 31st. The snow is expected to melt and subside in warmer weather on Tuesday and become more stable as it cools again on Wednesday and Thursday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in northern Westfjords in the last three days but sleet/rain in the lowlands. In the rest of the country, the new snow from last week has mostly melted in rain over the weekend. Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Dálítil snjókoma á þriðjudag en rigning á lálendi. Frost til fjalla miðvikudag og fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: A small dry loose avalanche fell in Hrafnaskál in Ólafsfjörðru on Tuesday 28th Oktober. On the 29th October and avalanche fell by the Siglufjörður road and 3 avalanches fell on the 30th above road Ólafsfjaraðrvegur, none of the reaching the road.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Little snow left in mountains and generally stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The new snow from last week has mostly melted in rain over the weekend. Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in northern Westfjords in the last three days but sleet/rain in the lowlands. In the rest of the country, the new snow from last week has mostly melted in rain over the weekend. Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Dálítil úrkoma á þriðjudag. Kólnandi veður og hægur vindur.

avalancheActivity.comment: Few small avalanches were reported last few days. The avalanches most likely released on Thursday or Friday in rain and warm weather
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow is found in gullies and depressions, while ridges are bare. The snow is wet to moist. Only small sluffs are expected, but people should be cautious on steep slopes.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow is found in gullies and depressions, while ridges are bare. The snow is wet to moist. Only small sluffs are expected, but people should be cautious on steep slopes.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some new snow in northern Westfjords in the last three days but sleet/rain in the lowlands. In the rest of the country, the new snow from last week has mostly melted in rain over the weekend. Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow remaining in the mountains will become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæglætis veður eða hæg norðlæg átt og úrkomulítið næstu daga
